resources.string: In case the image for the quiz is not picked,a color can be picked if both of them are not picked then a color will be randomly selected for the quiz
Pick an image for the quiz,just for visual representation
You can not only answers quizzes in this app. But you can too contribute some quizzes over hear.
Change your profile settings from here, There aren\'t much options for now.
The changes applied to the user are not directly shown in the app. SO see the changes,restart your app
Here are the available quiz\'s that one can participate in.Click one to participate in it
Enter the quiz Id to directly participate in the quiz. Make sure its approved
Adding the questions and there respective options to the database please wait
Know a certain topic,want to contribute a quiz for that,add the quiz details and add the questions
Quiz has been added to the database you now can add the questions to the quiz
If certain quiz are not found,that means they aren\'t approved yet,or they lost there approval
Your results will be added to the database, you can visit the results section to view the results
How did you perform in your last attempts ? Lets take a look at your results
Our records indicate that you haven\'t participated in ant of the quizzes.Take a quiz to test your knowledge
Create your own unique quizzes and challenge your knowledge.Put your knowledge on display today
Provided below is a comprehensive and exhaustive list of all the question that have been compiled
At the moment it\'s possible to delete questions but updating them is not currently an available option
Deleting this quiz will delete all the questions along with the results associated with the quiz
